alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 28 at 12:43AM MST until December 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches up to pass level, with up to 14 inches in the mountains. winds may gust in excess of 60 mph at times. * WHERE...The Continental Divide along the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they are prepared for dangerous conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
